short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension for managing multiple opened tabs effectively by grouping them based on the domain name of the URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Organize Tabs By Domain Name is a chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience. Download this extension and discover all the features provided to increase your productivity. 

This extension allows you to Instantly access a detailed list of all active tabs opened in your browser which helps you easily navigate between multiple opened tabs. 

Just click on any Tab title and you can directly jump to that tab from your active tab.
You can use the "Show URL" toggle button to control URL view in the Tab List. 

It also provide a comprehensive list of domain names currently opened in your browser. 

It's main feature is grouping Tabs based on their domain name. A simple click on the "Group" button alongside a domain name consolidates related tabs into a single tab group. You can also just click on "Group All Tabs" and it will group all open tabs based on their domain names for enhanced clarity and focus. 

And at last, you can close all Tabs from a particular domain by just clicking on "Close" button from domain list. 

This chrome extension is developed to ensure your productivity while working on your browser. You should no more worry about finding that one important tab from a forest of opened tabs.
